title: Brentford v Manchester United: Premier League – live
summary: Ruben Amorim's team seeks to secure a consecutive victory in west London. A minute-by-minute report will keep fans updated on the match's progress. Barry Glendenning will provide live commentary throughout the game.

title: Ryder Cup 2025: day two – live
summary: Live updates are being provided for day two at Bethpage Back, where Europe aims to solidify their lead. Writers are covering the event with hole-by-hole commentary. Stay tuned for the latest developments in the competition.

title: Crystal Palace v Liverpool, Atlético v Real Madrid and more: clockwatch – live
summary: Join our writers for live updates and commentary on the afternoon Premier League games and other matchups. Stay tuned for real-time insights and coverage of the action. Don't miss any key moments from the day's events!

title: England v Canada: Women’s Rugby World Cup final – live
summary: The Red Roses are facing Canada in a highly anticipated match for the championship title. The game is taking place in front of a sold-out crowd at Twickenham. Luke McLaughlin is providing a minute-by-minute report on the action.

title: West Ham appoint Nuno as manager after sacking Graham Potter
summary: West Ham has appointed Nuno Espírito Santo as their new manager following the dismissal of Graham Potter. The decision comes just two days before their match against Everton. This swift move aims to stabilize the team amid ongoing challenges.
